entry.title: PranshulGG/WeatherMaster
entry.summary:

WeatherMaster


(Last updated on 10-20-2024 at 1:45 PM UTC)

ğŸ‘ï¸ Screenshots


âœ¨ Features:

  • ğŸŒ¤ï¸ Current Weather: Get real-time updates on weather conditions in your area.
  • ğŸ“¢ Government Weather Alerts: Receive official alerts and warnings to stay safe.
  • â³ 24-Hour Forecast: Plan your short-term activities with accurate forecasts for the next two days.
  • ğŸ“… 14-Day Forecast: View detailed weather predictions for the upcoming week.
  • ğŸŒ™ Moon Phases: Track the phases of the moon and plan accordingly.
  • ğŸŒ‘ Moonrise & Moonset: Know the exact times for moonrise and moonset each day.
  • ğŸŒ… Sunrise & Sunset: Stay informed about sunrise and sunset times to optimize your day.
  • ğŸ“ Day Length: Check how long the daylight lasts each day.
  • ğŸ“ Day Description: Get a brief summary of the dayâ€™s weather conditions.
  • ğŸŒ§ï¸ Rain Bar: See a visual representation of expected rainfall.
  • ğŸ‘ï¸ Visibility: Monitor how far you can see clearly based on weather conditions.
  • ğŸ’§ Humidity: Check the current humidity levels to stay comfortable.
  • ğŸ§­ Pressure: Track atmospheric pressure to understand weather changes.
  • ğŸŒ¬ï¸ Wind Direction & Speed: Stay aware of wind patterns and strength.
  • â„ï¸ Snow Amount: Know the expected snowfall for winter planning.
  • â˜ï¸ Cloudiness: See how much of the sky is covered by clouds.
  • ğŸŒ¡ï¸ Min-Max Temperature: View the range of temperatures for the day.
  • ğŸŒ¬ï¸ Feels Like Temperature: Understand how the temperature feels based on wind and humidity.
  • ğŸŒ§ï¸ Precipitation Type & Area Coverage: Get details on what kind of precipitation is expected and its coverage area.
  • ğŸŒ UV Index: Stay protected from harmful UV rays with UV index updates.
  • ğŸŒ¿ Air Quality: Monitor air quality to stay informed about pollution levels.
  • ğŸ—ºï¸ Live Map: Access a real-time map to track weather conditions in different areas.
  • ğŸ“ Location Picker: Easily select and view weather information for different locations.
  • â­ Save Favorite Locations: Save your preferred locations for quick access to their weather updates.
  • ğŸ‘— Clothing Recommendations: Get suggestions on what to wear based on the current weather conditions.
  • ğŸŒ¾ Pollen Data (Europe Only): View pollen levels for grass, trees, and weeds in your area.

ğŸŒ Weather providers:

  • open-meteo
  • WeatherApi
  • OpenWeatherMap
  • accuweather

âš™ï¸ Other:

  • ğŸ“±Native Android Experience: Enjoy a user interface and interaction that closely resemble a native Android Weather app.

  • ğŸ¨Material Design: The app is built using Material Web Components, ensuring a clean, consistent, and visually appealing design.

  • âš™ï¸Customization Options: Enjoy a ton of customization options. Adjust themes, Units.

  • ğŸ“Responsive Design: WeatherMaster is fully responsive for all mobile devices.

  • ğŸ§©User-Friendly Interface: The app's interface is designed to be straightforward and user-friendly.

    •

ğŸ› ï¸ Built With:

  • HTML & CSS: For the basic structure and styling of the app.

  • JavaScript: To handle the app's logic and interactivity.

  • Java: Mainly used for JavaScript interface and permissions, allowing the app to run on Android devices.

  • Material Web Components: Utilized to create a consistent and attractive Material Design look and feel.

  • Weather icons: Google weather icons

    •

ğŸ“ Todos:

[!NOTE] The app is designed to run on Android devices and does not support web browsers. Attempting to open the app in a browser will not work.


Contact
